document.heading: District of Columbia Act on the Aging Amendment Act of 1988

history.narrative: Law 7-152, the “District of Columbia Act on the Aging Amendment Act of 1988,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-363, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 28, 1988 and July 12, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 15, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-207 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
